lasers

Class Lazorz

  • java.lang.Object
    • lasers.Lazorz

  • public class Lazorz
extends java.lang.Object
    Runs a simulation of a laser beam traversing through a grid of mirrors

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Lazorz() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void fire()
      Simulates the firing of the laser.
      static void initialize()
      Initializes the mirror grid inside the squares array based on the contents of the initStrings array.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Runs the simulation.
      static void show()
      Prints the squares array to the screen.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lazorz

        public Lazorz()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Runs the simulation. After displaying the mirror grid, it will ask the user which row they wish the laser to be fired into.

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Initializes the mirror grid inside the squares array based on the contents of the initStrings array.

      • show

        public static void show()
        Prints the squares array to the screen. If the laser has been fired, it indicates the row it has been fired from.

      • fire

        public static void fire()
        Simulates the firing of the laser. Draws the path in the squares array.
